about_the_game:
🧩 Puzzle Mode

Available in the demo version, which adds an extra challenge to the game! In this mode, you need to:

  • Recreate the island exactly as shown in the preview image.

  • Build the terrain and place objects in the correct positions.

  • Complete several levels, each offering a unique task.

This mode is perfect for those who love solving puzzles and testing their attention to detail. It will also introduce you to the basic mechanics and controls of the game.

🌿 A Meditative Strategy for the Soul

Immerse yourself in a world of calm and creativity. Create breathtaking dragon islands, customize them to your preferences, and watch as the inhabitants care for their toothy pets. This is the perfect opportunity to relax, experiment with design, and get familiar with the mechanics.

🏠 Customize Houses

In the demo version, you will be able to:

  • Move, rotate, and resize buildings.

  • Place windows and doors however you like.

  • Change colors and materials for a unique look.

🔍 Open Playtest

We are actively working on the game and want to hear your opinion! As part of the open playtest, we are testing various gameplay mechanics, to make the game as engaging and user-friendly as possible. Your participation and feedback will help us improve the game before its full release.
